product_name: WD-40 BIKE HD Bike Degreaser - 20 fl. oz.
long_description: Safe for carbon fiber, titanium, aluminum, steel, chrome, rubber or plastic, the WD-40 BIKE HD Bike degreaser in a 20 fl. oz. bottle dissolves and removes grease from frames and drivetrains. Formulated in a thick, biodegradable formula, WD-40 BIKE HD Bike Degreaser clings to surfaces for effective cleaning.
short_description: Safe for carbon fiber, titanium, aluminum, steel, chrome, rubber or plastic, the WD-40 BIKE HD Bike degreaser in a 20 fl. oz. bottle dissolves and removes grease from frames and drivetrains.
